body: Treetop Village - when animated, it "saves" changes even after end of turn - i.e. damage dealt to, buffs (Giant Growth) - so when animated next time it will be not 3/3 but 6/6 with damge marked on it (if dealt)
author: [OLEGtheK...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/106579007142717194127/)
title: Bug report - Treetop Village

comments.body: It seems other animated lands do the same, all effects (+x/x, evasion abilities, etc.) that were on creature-land sticks to it.

The problem was that at the end of turn the land stopped being a creature so the code that should remove temporary effects from creatures never did.

content:
_From [OLEGtheK...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/106579007142717194127/) on November 27, 2011 23:25:34_

Treetop Village - when animated, it "saves" changes even after end of turn - i.e. damage dealt to, buffs (Giant Growth) - so when animated next time it will be not 3/3 but 6/6 with damge marked on it (if dealt)
